value:
$WmMPID_総選挙ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|I must continue searching for my
brother. If you intend to stand in the
way, that is your mistake to make.$k$p

$WmMPID_総選挙エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|It is my duty to carry out the wishes
of those who called me here... I will
see their dreams fulfilled!$k$p

$WmMPID_総選挙カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|As Nohr's new queen, it would not
do for me to be humiliated on the
battlefield...$k$p

$WmMPID_総選挙ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|With these hands, we will shape the
future! Please, watch over us, Yune...$k$p

$WmMPID_総選挙アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|For the sake of those who called me
here, and the other Brave Heroes,
I cannot lose!$k$p
